column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////i do prefer jinya's appetizers to their ramen
column2: especially their jinya buns. the pork belly on these buns literally melt in your mouth
column3: and the bun itself is so yummy and fluffy. their happy hour is the best time to try their appetizers
column4: if you're interested! online it says their happy hour times are from 3-5
column5: but there's a physical sign in front of jinya saying that happy hour is from 3-6.
